attributes.action: Make Overbright LED headlights a fail for MOTs on all vehicles.
attributes.additional_details: This issue needs a UK wide legal approach. Manufacturers need to stop putting the bulbs in the cars and people need to stop retrofitting them.  Overbright bulbs should carry the same penalty as a broken brakelight, headlamp or indicator.
attributes.background: Stop the takeover of excessively bright LED headlights on the UK roads. They are dangerous and unnecessary.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for similar action: "Ban LED vehicle headlights or regulate bulb wattage" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/744882
